title: Packet Loss during games and in League Client
body:
Hello,
These past 2 days (today and yesterday) I've experienced a lot of jumpy scenes while playing, characters freezing, minions freezing yet you can see that their health drops and it suddenly fixes itself for the time being and all the action that has occurred during the "time freeze" happens all at once its incredibly hard to play under these circumstances because it happens in teamfights and such, not to mention that the LoL Client has been acting up the same way constantly freezing up after games(unable to leave the stats menu after the game it just freezes there or unable to join my friend's game when he invites me) even starting up the client feels  really slow ... Could it be packet loss or is it not because i used the "log" you suggest usually to see if i have experienced something of the sort all of them say that i ahve minimal packet loss and a stable connection about 30-36 ms and up to 2% maximum packet loss but i doubt that 2% packet loss can cause such freezes for up to 5 to 10 seconds sometimes.

replies.body: Even 2% packet loss can be enough to cause some pretty weird game interactions. Even though it's a really small amount, there is still some data getting lost or corrupted before it hits our servers and goes back to your network. Most of the time it happens when your ISP routes your connection in a really weird way, but our tech guys might still be able to help in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new).
Same here, i am waiting from yesterday i did everything that they said but nothing helps... i cant play from 2 days its too laggy...
I've been having the same issue today dude, just randomly freezing and not seeing the minions health.
